text: Wim de Jongh (7 January 1928 – 9 September 2022) was a Dutch footballer who played as an attacker. De Jong played with USV Elinkwijk in the Eredivisie, the Dutch highest level of professional football in the Netherlands. In the 1955–56 season he scored 32 times and became top-3 topsorer that season. He became an honorary member of USV Elinkwijk.Voormalige topscorer Wim de Jongh (94) overleden , Utrechtste Sportkrant, 12 September 2022Oud-Elinkwijker Wim de Jongh (1928-2022), nieuws030.nl, 12 September 2022 In 1960 he moved to SBV Vitesse.Wim de Jongh, transfermarkt.nl De Jongh lived in Nieuwegein almost all his life. He died in Nieuwegein on 9 September 2022, at the age of 94 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== A selection of images in Dutch newspapers *Image of De Jong, in Nieuw Utrechtsch dagblad, March 1955 *Image of De Jong, in Nieuw Utrechtsch dagblad, October 1955 *Image of De Jong, in Nieuw Utrechtsch dagblad, April 1956 *Image the marriage of De Jong and Boerkool, in Nieuw Utrechtsch dagblad, November 1956 *Image of De Jong, in Nieuw Utrechtsch dagblad, October 1957 *Image of De Jong, in Het Rotterdamsch parool, March 1959 Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch footballers
title: Wim de Jongh
